content.detailedDescription: I was flying from providence ,ri on may 15th 2008 to fort myers fl,after taking pictures, from my window, above north carolina,only after downloading them to my computer i could see these lights just below the plane.Don't know what they are.Maybe someone have an explanation. thanks
content.summary: Lights over north carolina

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside on the deck, behind the house, at 11:32pm est in kent city, michigan. i looked up and saw a blue/white large light moving across the sky from southwest to northeast. i saw it go below the clouds and then through the thin clouds. it looked like it was travelling maybe 50% faster than a commercial airline plane. it also seemed to curve slightly northward as it travelled. the light was maybe 20% dimmer than venus usually is and was approximately 4 times larger in diameter than venus appears. i only saw this one light all the way across the sky and no blinking lights of any kind. it did not change in intensity either, except for when it went through the thin clouds.
content.summary: Blue/white light going across sky little dimmer than venus

content.detailedDescription:
It was appx 9:15 est clear sky with the moon in the east. i was walking my dog in my neighborhood heading west listening to music on a bluetooth headset linked to my g phone.
my dog stopped to pee and i looked up and noticed an orange reddish cone shaped light over our neighborhood coming from the west heading e-se. it was bright and glowed orangish red. what made me take another look was the fact that it made no noise. i just stood there staring at it as it headed closer. since it was clear and almost overhead i had a hard time gauging the distance, the only other object that was near was the streetlight (sodium vapor lamps) that is in the picture i took.
since i live about 3 miles from the tamiami executive airport i see planes and helicopters all the time. i was also in the usaf (many years ago) and i am very familiar with aircraft navigation lights. this bore no resemblance to that as it had no blinkies or other lights in a normal configuration. it was more like a shimmering orange top or inverted cone that was red on the bottom or something. since i was listening to music on my phone prior to seeing it so it took me a bit of time to get the camera working (i have a case which makes the button hard to get to).

 i removed the headset btw thats how i know the ufo was silent. two neighbors were walking by and they saw it too and asked me what it was and we just stared at it. it continued moving  e-se very slowly but gaining altitude.  a light plane had taken off from the airport and was now heading south the plane was about 600 feet (typical in my neighborhood) and we could clearly see the lights on the plane and hear the engine. it seemed the plane was heading toward the ufo. at that point the ufo turned south and  headed away from the plane. it then rapidly disappeared. i tried to take video but i could not get the ufo in frame as it took off quickly. (and i was fumbling with the camera and my dogs leash).

i called the tamiami tower who routed me to mia approach control. i told them my location and asked if there was any traffic in the vicinity for the past 20 minutes and they could only confirm 1 airliner out of mia that flew over me from the north as i was speaking to him. he could not confirm the small plane or any other traffic in the area. i uploaded the pic to my twitter account (threv65) and made an entry in my facebook from my phone.

the funny thing is, i thought i was looking at it for about 5 minutes but when i got home and looked at the timestamps on the picture and my video attempt almost 30 minutes had gone by.   i called channel 7 news and reported it but they had no calls (they are the local sensationalist news station everybody calls them first with the the weird stuff). 
i have attached the phot and the video thoug htey are of course really crappy and i'm not sure whether or not it is on the video (maybe near the end but i could not get it framed as it was heading away and my dog kept pulling me.
content.summary: Light in low in sky heading e-se
Rotating colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
Well,my wife and i just watch a ufo pass over our home in brampton.It was only a couple of thousand feet up no sound and one solid bright white light moving from north -west to south-east towards dixie and queen.Maybe 10 secounts after the ufo cross over our home a jet at a much higher altitude crossed over it's path and you could see the plane's light's very clearly. 

the sighting was at 9:45pm partly cloudy skys
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, july 5th 2009, myself and a friend were at another friends house in silverthorne co. his house is high on a hill facing west to the valley below, and the gore mountain range rising above it. the friend who owned the home, noticed a strange object low in the air, across the mountain on the other side. i saw what looked like a balloon above 6 or 7 spherical shaped objects hovering above the ground, and moving northward. the spheres seemed to move individually, yet seemed like they were all connected, as if a cable was attached to them. the spheres seemed opaque. we observed it as it continued to move northward, as if it was probing the area. it would move upward and downward some, but wouldn���t go very high in the air. numerous times, it would move through treed areas. i thought it would crash, but it just kept moving through the trees, as if the trees were non-existent. i took a picture with my camera phone. one friend got out his binoculars. he watched through the binoculars, as the spheres moved towards a heard of elk. the elk raised up, and went running as the spheres got close to them. we watched it continue northward on it���s probing adventure, till it disappeared out of site, north of us.
content.summary: Saw 6-7 spherical objects flying, through trees, etc.

content.detailedDescription: I was again trying out my new night vision monocular and had seen sattelites as well as a line of 3 white star like objects very high  amoungst the stars moving in a straight line across the night sky until they went out of view.I was resting my eyes immediatly after observing the 3 lights when i saw what i beleive to be a triangular shaped object very low at maybe 1000 feet or less illuminated by 3 orange very bright lights.  the object was moving from west to east at a steady speed fast but not that fast that i did not have time to observe it for about 25 seconds before it went out of sight.The object was completely silent and just seemed to glide across the night sky.10 minutes earlier i was observing a police helicopter in the same area and was extremly noisy and appeared to be at simialr height to the ufo i had observed, so i know that this ufo was not commercial or private air traffic from the eerie silence as it approached and departed the area.I am really annoyed that i did not have my camcorder to hand at the time because this is twice now in 2 days that i have seen strange silent objects pass and i just hope i get another opportunity to witness these objects again but i will be prepared.
content.summary: Saw a bright light object orange lights looked like 3 i think it was triangular

content.detailedDescription:
I am a retired detective with 25 years as a peace officer. with me was a marketing director for a national company and my 17 year old son. we live on a large ranch. it was 9:30 pm when i entered the inside of our home. as i looked out our kitchen window, i noticed extremely bright "bluish" lights which upon further observation were actually portholes that were illuminated from within. there were three on the bottom in a row, one above-right/center, above that one was another 
single illuminated porthole left-center and then two on the top:     
                                                                                                                        .  .
                                                                                                                         .
                                                                                            illustration              .
                                                                                                                     .    .    .                                                  

the object was approximately 300-400 feet from where i was watching it. i thought initially that someone was in my field illegally with a truck and trailer. as i watched, i noticed that it was apparently hovering and made no noise. i immediately concluded that it was not a motor vehicle of any kind and noted that it made no noise whatsoever. as i was watching it, my friend came running out to the back deck asking what it was and then my son came, asking what the bright lights were. we spent approximately 5 full minutes trying to figure out what it was. totally perplexed, i got my flashlight, gun and we all got into my truck which was parked in front of my house. we drove around the house and noticed that the object "was just gone". we drove to the exact location in which there are many trees that are part of our nursery. they are approximately 15-20 feet tall. at no time did we see anything "fly away", flash of light or anything. it was just gone. had it been a motor vehicle of any kind, there would have been tracks, dust,etc. additionally, my ranch is fenced in with one way in-out. i got out of my truck and approached the landing-hovering site to look and obtain physical evidence. the area in which the craft was located consisted of soft,thick dust that had just been sprayed with water several hours earlier. i found absolutely no physical evidence whatsoever. there is debate within the three of us if the craft was in fact hovering or had actually landed. the brilliance of the light in which the craft produced was "unearthly" and like nothing i have ever witnessed in my life. i had no logical explanation for what had happened and this incident defied the laws of physics. no sound, no con trail, no disturbed soil, no bent trees, nothing.

we drove back to the house. extremely bothered by what we had just witnessed, my son and i returned to the area approximately 20 minutes later. i was not afraid but intrigued by what had occurred. i turned off my truck, noting it was a beautiful moonlight night, and the moon was extremely bright.

as we were re examining the area, we both hear a loud bizarre "click" noise off to our right in the area of green houses. we looked into the nearest green house when we heard another distinct loud "click", this time coming from a thicket of trees. as we approached this area, we heard another distinct "click" noise coming from behind us in another thicket of trees. we heard a total of 5 distinct loud "click" noises. in all honesty, the "clicking" noises  were coming from all around us and after the fifth one, it was a little eerie (even though we could see nothing with our flashlights) and i instructed my son to return to my truck and we left.

the most unexplainable part of this story is as follows: my brother came over to my ranch approximately an hour later (10:30)pm. he has a doctorate degree, three master degrees and works for a international company. additionally, he has taught physics. we are both skeptics and believe that most ufo sightings can be logically explained. when i told him of what had just occurred earlier, he suggested that we go back down to the location and figure out what it was that we saw. as we were at the location (which was approximately an hour and a half later) we both witnessed an extremely bright "swish" in the western sky. it was probably a half second. but what we saw appeared as if the atmosphere "opened up" for a millisecond and an object "went inside" or poked through and then the atmosphere closed up leaving a "swirling" motion in the sky. a "wormhole" or "porthole"?. it terrified him so bad that his eyes watered and his voice cracked, insisting that we immediately leave towards the house. he cannot believe what he saw and both of us have had several sleepless nights.We can verify and confirm our credentials. we have absolutely no idea of what we saw and my brother, as educated as he is, can not give a  logical explanation of what we saw and i think this is why we both are so disturbed by the incident. we cannot report it in fear of ridicule and do not want to utilize our names. we both are heavily connected at the local/state/federal political level. if you have any questions, i did leave my email address. hope you have some answers, because we do not!
content.summary: Approx 30 ft wide, 20 ft tall, cone shaped, seven portholes illuminated from within, unknown color

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were on our boat on mineola bay in fox lake. my sons' girlfriend noticed it first. we thought it was a plane. it came into sight at a great speed then it slowed and finally hovered. we passed the binoculars amongst us. none of us could identify the object, or how far away it was. after these few minutes it just started to fade and then it was gone. there were 6 adults and 5 children and we all seen it. no one really wanted to talk about it much.
content.summary: Metallic grey sphere with a bright orange glow on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting over mcarthur ohio  july 8th 2009 3:15- 3:45pm

on july 8th around 3:15 pm on a clear day with some puffy clouds. a friend called me to tell me about a pecullier object in the sky over mcarthur ohio. i left within a few minutes to look for it my self. as i came upon a clearing i looked around and then saw it my self. i saw an object hanging in the sky. it was about a mile up in the sky.  i could observe a bright object with a slight discernable shape slowly drifting to the east over the town of mcarthur. my friend in the other part of the town was observing the the same object with some family members. when she originally saw it she said it  alternated between a disc shape to that of a boomerang  and had a yellowish smoky brown type aura around it. sighting lasted for about a half hour to 45 minutes.

originnly spotted by tamara wright of mcarthur and witnessed by dane remy, josie ward, mkichelle royster all of mcarthur. and robert gordon of plaistow new hampshire at a different location in mcarthur.
content.summary: Strange object seen over mcarthur ohio

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had gone to watch fireworks, we were too early and had positioned ourselves in a parking lot where we could see from the car. they shoot them every year at the local ball stadium (l p frans) off of hwy 321. we were parked near the catawba river bridge at a closed resturant and were facing sw. what we saw was exactly like what i have read that so many others around the country saw that night. i have seen other ufo's as well, but these were obviously huge or traveled everywhere according to all the reports. they were scheduled to have the fireworks at 10 o'clock.. we saw two objects approx. 15-20 minutes before they started. one appeared out of nowhere.. almost looked as though it rose straight up out of the horizon, then it traveled toward us horozontaly then reversed itself into the opposite direction as it continued to rise again. then it seemed to disappear out of sight. there were two of these objects. the second appeared approx. 10 minutes after the first one was gone. my husband, who is a non believer, made a joke about how someone in hickory would report ufo's. these were not large balloons, as he had first suggested. the appearence of the fire did not go out as he had claimed it would after they rose. there is no way they were balloons. these objects were bright, orange & dark orange, round and appeared to flicker like they were on fire. the height is difficult for me when they leveled out, but was around cloud level.. these two objects were not helicopters, airplanes, satilites, balloons or like anything else i have ever seen... it has impressed me that so many people saw them over such a huge area.. seems to me like most of the us... what were they?..
content.summary: Orange floating firey type objects

content.detailedDescription:
by reason of the encounters, i now understand we have always hosted time travelers. some in energy orbs, some in unidentified flying objects (u.F.O.) i have seen them and have prospered from my encounters with them.
   i swear to you what i am about to share with you is truth.
   the encounters began in the year 1956. i was stationed at port hueneme naval base, california.
   i had met a girl that lived down the coast highway in santa monica. late one night i was allowed to do the driving of her car back to my base after our evening together. as we were traveling back we saw two "sailors" hitch-hiking. we agreed to give them a lift.
   i noticed the "sailors" looked quite young, too young in fact to be in the navy. they didn't appear to be much older than fourteen or fifteen. i asked the "sailors", "where are you headed"? one replied, "the coos head naval facility in charleston, oregon". i had never heard of this place, but i said nothing.  meanwhile we all continued on our way.
   as we approached the oxnard road,"this is where i turn" i exclaimed. then we let the "sailors" out, wished them a safe journey. then we made our turn and as we did, we saw a strange-looking ball of light hovering close to the center of the road. this was an intense light but did not hurt the eyes. as we drove closer to this light, it disappeard. "wow", we both exclaimed. as soon as we drove through the spot where the light had been, a bone-chilling icyness passed through our bodies. we looked at each other with questioning surprise..."what the heck?" when i checked my rear view mirror-there it was- behind the car! now we were both scared. my date screamed and got down into the floor board. i said "i'm going to stop". she was sobbing, shaking and clinging to the floor board. her sudden terror was contagious and i did not stop. the light appeared to be following us now.
   up ahead, there was an intersection where the road made a dip. after going over the dip, i watched in my rear view mirror to see whether the light made the dip as we had... it did not!
   there was a car coming up the road toward us. i switched my headlights off and on and pulled into his lane which caused the approaching car to pull off the road and stop. as we passed the now stopped car, the ball of light illuminated the scene, the car was a taxi, the driver wore a white shirt and his left arm was resting on the door window frame. he didn't look at us. he appeared to be quite calm-looking straight ahead.
   in the meantime, we and the ball of light continued down the road. because the light was becoming smaller, slowing and lagging a bit behind our car, i thought it was ending it's pursuit.
    ahead, i could see the street lights of oxnard. i determined, if i could make it to these lights we would be safe and could possibly see what this thing was. as we went under the street lights, the ball of light
stopped abruptly just before reaching the street lights, hovered over the street for a moment then made a departure at a forty-five degree up and out into the night sky. nothingness. no vapor trail, no tracking lights- nothing.
   we drove to the first avaliable phone booth and called the police,i told them briefly about our encounter and they sent a patrol car to us. we then related the entire encounter. the policeman got into his car,and we in ours and we retraced our route, stopping along the way to point out significant facts. the most important fact being the forcing of the taxi to pull over off the road. the policeman called his dispatch officer, they in turn called the taxi company. the policeman asked the taxi company whether they had a taxi in that vicinity at that time. they replied in the affirmative. the policeman further asked if the driver had reported seeing anything strange or unusal. no, nothing said the taxi company. i was dumbfounded! i told the policeman i could process the fact the driver did not see the strange ball of light but i could never accept the fact he had been forced off the road, came to a complete stop and yet, had no knowledge of the event. i reported the incident to my superior and he filed a report.
   i, in fact, was given orders to report to the very same base the "sailors" called the coos head naval facility almost a year later. when i arrived at this base, it was not ready for occupancy. i and others there were bivouacked in a local hotel in coos bay,oregon while we prepared the base for residency.
   while at the coos head base i had another encounter. this encounter was with four thin and tall persons that looked quite normal. no big eyes nor green skin, they all wore blue jump suits.
   this encounter took place within and on a secure base doing secret military work. i am a plank owner of this base. i was there from 1957 through 1959.
   i found myself laying on a waist high gurney looking at the four strangers. i was quite relaxed. over my head and at my feet was a round flat screen. my head was laying on an elevated pillow that was responsible for transforming my thoughts into movie-like images onto the screen.
   the location of this encounter was in a room in the front of the chow hall doors. no one came through this area while the encounter was taking place. it was during the early morning hours. one of the "men" questioned me about the spinning gyro and what i understood about it. instantly,an image appeared on the screen. now i did not feel so relaxed and i tried not to co-operate. the "men" looked at each other and i sensed the session was over, whatever it had been.
   the next thing i remember was waking in my bunk wondering what had just happened. i did not mention this encounter to anyone as i did not want to appear as unstable working on this base.
   now that time has elapsed,i realize this encounter was to place time-release information into my sub-conscious.
   since that time at coos head, i have obtained a united states patent which is for a vehicle that operates using harmonics. furthermore, i have just recently invented and made working models of the world's first hybrid boat motor, runs on a sound wave. this motor has no mechanical propellar and will not harm aquatic life.
   there were many things revealed to me. and now i know things like a seer would know.
   in 1988, i retired early and found myself easily bored. having always been a high achiever and a busy doer type person, i pondered what i could possibly do with my extra time. i decided to renovate my small outdoor utility shed into a workshop. there i reasoned, i could tinker with small ideas and repair minor household malfunctions.
   as time went on i found myself attempting to make a working model of some sort of new motor with internal push. this idea had floated around in the dark recesses of my sub-conscious for years. i was basically experimenting with odds and ends of materiel which were on hand around the house. i knew what i wanted to build but was not entirely certain just how to get to the end results. after several days and many failures, a small model of the motor began to take shape.
   because my "shop" was so tiny, i usually worked with the door slightly ajar. no one was aware of what i was working upon.
   one day while working on the motor, i noticed a man walking into my back yard. i stepped out of the shop, pulling the door closed behind me,  and went to greet him. he was a well-dressed person, average looking, about forty-five or so. i said hello and could i help him. he looked at me and i knew at once he worked with computers as we stood together, my thoughts returned to the encounter in 1958 at coos head naval facility. without saying another word i smiled and he pointed to my shop door. i knew he was well aware of what i was working on.
   he left the back yard  and i never saw him again.
   know this, the time travelers, are real and the (u.F.O.)is there time machines.
   
   know i know this report is lengthy i do have a shorter version.

                                  i am virgil e atkinson
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A bright round light--did not hurt your eyes

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-25 around 9:30 or so on july 4th 2009. i could see fire workes in the distance coming from several towns. i was scanning back and forth and notices 5 or six glowing orbs in the sky, not real close to any firworks that were going off. they looked out of the ordinary so i watched them rather than the fireworks. the orbs were kind of in a little group moving slightly up and down, left and right, but were staying a a tight little group. one orb started to vier off to the right. it went quite a distance away from the others but they were all still in sight. it slowly drifted off to the side maybe a quarter mile. i was probably 30 miles or so away so that is my estimate. then the lone orb started moving back toward the other orbs. slowly it made it's way back to the original group. after the orbs re-grouped, one by one they appeared to merge with eachother. all the orbs merged into one and then the orb slowly disappeared into the horizon. when i first saw it, i knew it wasn't ordinary, it was very different form all the other lights around it and it wasn't close by any fireworks. it didn't move like anything i had seen before and i looked for any sign that could disprove what i though it was, a ufo(s) of some kind. no blinking lights like on a plane or predictable flightpath like any plane either. i didn't know what to think at first but i quickly came up with the idea that it could be a ufo. after looking for any possible evidence to refute my beliefs am left with a strong belief that what i saw was a ufo(s).
content.summary: Several erratic moving objects. one drifts off, then comes back. all object merge into one and disappear into horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting inside my apartment with balcony open and i saw a white light passing by at a great altitude from east to west. i saw 3 planes passing by along the same rute 20 min before this but i could se the lights on them. and i know that they have them on if they are below 10 000 feet so this might have been a plane at a high altitude reflecting the sunlight. the problem is that i don't have a compass so i cant take out the direction. but the light was in a position that it could have reflected on a plane. hard to tell. but to me it looked like a white light, cigarshaped moving fast over the sky. i wonder if this was a plane.
content.summary: Luminous ufo

content.detailedDescription:
July 4th,2009 approximately 10:45pm
after observing the bethlehem, pa area fireworks display, my 2 guests and husband were sitting on the back deck of our home. my sister-in-law was the first to observe the crafts, and called my husband's, her brother's, attention to it. my husband then came to our back door to get my attention. i walked out on the back deck, and saw the crafts immediately. the four of us stood there shocked for several minutes. i ran out front, through the house, but the crafts were not there. we had observed 8 orange in color, egg shaped ufos with approximately 6-8 "legs". the crafts had an aura around them with a single red light in the middle of their belted centers; in the area similar to a belt buckle. the crafts flew slowly, but "chased" after one another like children playing tag, and much lower in the sky than an airplane or the stars. the ufos proceeded to fly off in a east south eastern direction. we were all stunned and scared by what we had never before experienced. i/we am/are now a believer/s!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Orange-ish egg shaped object w/6-8 "legs" , red light in the center of belt, glowing

content.detailedDescription: I saw an object flying slowly westbound while i was in my car alone, driving on 83 north toward pennsylvania. i thought it looked a little strange, as it was a disc shape, white and moving very slowly. i could hear no noise or see no lights. the object seemed to be flying lower than a commercial aircraft and was not shaped like, or being flown at the speed of a private jet or helicopter. there were no contrails. the object went behind a small cloud and disappeared. i took a picture on my camera phone and the object shows up as a small white disc. the resolution is not the best.
content.summary: Disc shaped white object spotted while driving northbound on interstate 83 near monkton, md

content.detailedDescription:
Last night july 7th around 9:20 pm se of fresno. my wife and i spotted some unusual flying objects in the sky by the moon. i was only able to capture part of the event on video cause my camera ran out of charge. 

but in the first half we saw the object on the right side of the moon just siting there, for a good 3 minutes. i ran off to get my camera... once i started to tape...The object began to move towards the moon as i was tapeing this i noticed another object coming into view, once the first one flew past the moon my camera went out.

as it flew past the moon it lowered itself slightly under the moon on the left side, then stopped. as it was moving the other ufo that came into view from the right side of the moon also stopped. it stopped below the right corner of the moon. the objects stayed in place creating a triangle position with the moon for a good 2 minutes before disappearing.

i have contacted mufon once before, strange as it sounds these objects we are able to see almost at will. but they are very difficult to record. but we do have some video of it.This has been on going since november 3rd 2008. 

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=kkr6ewlofuc&feature=channel_page
content.summary: 2 ufo's paused under the moon

content.detailedDescription:
What i seen was this.  while sitting on the deck i was watching fireworks, i looked between two trees believing that what i was seeing was a firework that i known by a "flare" on it's way up it sparkles and soon enough goes out, easy enough.  

the twist to this was that the flare actually kept going, it changed to a reddish color and continued it's flight path (which started making be believe i had just seen this object come into our atmosphere instead of the object being a "flare" firework.", in about 2 seconds of distance from how fast these objects were flying, came another dot but instead of it being reddish, it was a more of an orange colored dot flying what seemed in pursuit of the reddish one.

the first object i starred at long enough and it seemed as though in the center it was a t with either edge acutely angled instead of it being at a 90 degree angle.

my feelings during and after were all pretty much the same, i was calm during the whole situation and after just because of the sole fact i believe if there are aliens and there are ufo's i highly doubt they're here to hurt us.

i lost sight of this object while it flew in a constant flight path while maintaining it's speed, it flew back out of our atmosphere or what seemed to, which then it just looked like another star in our space.
content.summary: 2 lights flying over washington.

content.detailedDescription: Watched int. space station slowly go by to my west, followed by another simaler object same path-brightness-altitude as station. [did not think too much of it until i read someone else saw this]second object just dis appeared! simple as that, cannot elaborate any further. i do not know if shuttle is in rondevous, or if it is as bright as the station. that's about it!
content.summary: Looked like int. space station

content.detailedDescription:
After firworks at washington township high school in sewell nj. our location was eggharbor and greentree rds. i was in our truck as a passenger, we were waiting for traffic to clear so we could enter the shopping plaza. i saw a reddish orange object gliding across the sky, facing se from my right to left. it seemed to flicker. it would brighten and dim speed up then slow. i watched it for about 2-5 minutes and lost sight of it suddenly. i pointed it out to my husband but later when all the other reports came in i asked him and apparently he brushed it off. 
 i have reported before and just wanted to let mufon know i witnessed the object in this location and time. hope they can track the path of the incidents on that night. like many other people who watch the sky and see ufo's i can't seem to stop watching and reporting hoping someone has seen the same. i am not crazy as some people think . i just pay attention.
content.summary: Red/orange object

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a friend in broomfield colorado, near denver, when i was standing in his front yard with him waiting for a cable repair guy to show up. i was facing west towards the rocky mtns. i noticed several commercial aircraft flying overhead at about 17k to 20k ft. they were traveling from the south toward the north. just after one of them had passed by, i noticed what looked like a star directly above the mountains and quite stationary. i called the object to the attention of my friend who could not tell what it was either but did find it strange. he thought that it was rotating and could possibly have had a second object very close to it. i could not tell if there were two of them but it did look like it was rotating. after about twenty minutes of continuous viewing, it starting moving from west to southeast. at this time, i ran into the house and got my video camera. i tried to zoom in on the object but at full zoom, i could not get an image. this told me that the object was very far away. i asked my friend for a pair of binoculars or some other viewing device but he didn't have any. as the object continued to move toward the southeast, i watched it continuously. it finally stopped traveling and came to a rest. the total travel time from west to southeast was about fourty minutes. as i continued to watch the object, the size and brightness did not change. after another ten minutes at its new position, it started moving straight up. at this time, the object kept climbing until i could not focus on it with the naked eye. all in all the total view time was about 1hr 10min. the weather conditions for this day were clear skies and very sunny. being 10am when the object was first spotted, and the sun shining brightly, the sun was low in the sky behind me and was shining brightly on the mountains in front of me. the conditions could not have been any better for viewing such an event. at no time did i loose sight of the object until the very end when it climbed too high to view any longer. this object was close enough to dia airport that radar signatures could have been picked up. if they do not have reports of this object then maybe commercial aircraft flying in the area may have spotted it as well. i noticed that when the object was at the southeast position, at least one aircraft flew under the object at an elevation of more than thirty-thousand ft. i checked with the nasa web site for tracked objects and i could not find any man made objects in the denver area at that time of day in visible site. i hope to discuss this further with an fi.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright object high in the sky with little motion and strange trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
My bro-in-law and i were walking around after watching the fireworks and noticed an orange light moving very slowly across the sky.  we didn't think anything of it at first.  i pointed it out to him and we decided to stop and watch it.  no one else around us seemed to notice it despite a relatively large crowd leaving the fireworks viewing area.  

we watched it for about three more minutes until it went behind some clouds.  we did not see it reappear.

i watch the skies a lot and have been fooled by iridium satellites, distant planes, etc. but this seems like none of those.  to my knowledge i have never seen a chinese lantern, so this could have been part of a coordinated stunt by several people across several states.  entirely possible, but it was strange.
content.summary: Slow moving orange ball moving across sky after fireworks

content.detailedDescription: Some friends and i were driving on highway 401 westbound towards toronto ontario, when we were stuck in heavy traffic.  to our left, approx. 3 or 4 km's away, there was a large black flat object hovering in the sky, over lake ontario.  what caught my attention was that it was not moving. at first i thought it was a large bird hovering but then i realized it was too far away.  the sky was clear and there were no clouds at all in the area.  i pointed it out to my friends and they also did not know what it was.  it did not move at all and judging by the distance it was from us, it would have to be at least 1 km in length.  as the traffic started moving, we lost sight of it behind some trees.  once we were in an opening again, the object was gone.  there was no sign of it anywhere in the sky.  we had approx. 30 secs of a clear view of the object and it did not move at all.
content.summary: Large black flat disc hovering over lake ontario

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4, 2009 at about 4:15 pm what appeared to be a thin sheet of orange-brown or rust colored cloud-like substance somewhat rectangular in its confines of an estimated 5 to 10 feet long by 4 to 10 feet across from perhaps 100 feet away, that did not dissipate, flew across our path, heading southbound in denver, over i-76 at just about the area where the overpass exchange to i-25 is reached when driving eastbound on the freeway. 2 adults and 3 children saw this ufo from inside a car and it seemed to come to within less than 50 feet and head more westbound just after passing us. i am sure it could have been picked up by camera, if there are any in that area, since the swift-moving slice-of-cloud or ghostly image was visible to everyone in the car. 

my initial thought, as i saw it up ahead of us to the north/left of us was that this might be a toxic cloud that we have heard about, but never seen. it was lower than the clouds in the sky and was right in front of our vehicle as it passed us, heading south. we all had to really stare at it to understand what was happening and try to identify what it was. (it's just my opinion that it wanted us all to get a good look at it, since it went in front of our vehicle and then around to the side where all of us except the driver could continue to try to figure it out.)

the driver of the vehicle is a good family friend in the jewish faith, who tried to reason that the anomaly must have some logical, rational explanation, like a fireworks after-image or a weather balloon. he had to agree, though, that due to the rapid and continuous rate of speed at which it traveled, while retaining the see-through, cloud-like appearance and shape, it did not behave in a manner that fits our understanding pertaining to clouds, smoke, or wind. he stated that it looked somewhat like a narrow, vertical chariot, and that whatever it was that we'd observed, "it seemed to be on a mission." he describes the curling moving smoky or cloud-like areas as paisley, especially on the bottom of it. my son drew his version and had the paisley curling swirls at the bottom area as well.

i was the front-seat passenger who, likewise, suspect that there is probably some scientific explanation for what we presently have no knowledge about. what we saw seemed to be solid and yet fluid, as if moving around w/in the confines. we were able to see the white clouds behind it, through the areas where there were "holes" in the object.

this did not seem to be of metal or any substance that we know of, as it did not reflect light, similar to how the moon looks at night during an eclipse, is how the object seemed to just be there in the air, but flying, and as it passed us, the shape had changed yet stayed within the space. so while it was coming into our line of vision and while it was in front of us, and as it passed us, and after it was traveling southwest of us, the shape it took within it's rectangular confines was similar to seeing moving ultrasound image of a moving creature, except seeming to have no 3-dimensional depth to it.

the shapes that we observed did seem somewhat as angels are depicted, having what appear to be wings, and although it was strange to see such a thing travel around us, we were really not frightened by it, just amazed. like my daughter said, it could have been either an angel or a demon.

we are still working on making artistic representations of this thing, which is how we determined that it had actually changed shape yet stayed w/in a certain confined area, being fluid like smoke or cloud in movement, and yet not dissipating as it traveled upright and then as we entered the i-25 freeway, we could no longer see it behind us as it was no longer in our view.
content.summary: Almost like a large elaborate flat rectangular kite or somebody's intricate paisley-designed gate took off flying upright across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Went out back to smoke to sit a while since i just woke up to drink my coffee. when i looked up and saw this ball of light just going across the sky. was going in a perfectly straight line headed se of abilene texas. it was very bright and pretty low. thought at first maybe a sattellite but oddly enough like on cue their was a sattellite going across the sky in the same direction and this was much much smaller and dimmer than this light that i saw. it didn't change directions at all just went pretty fast but not super fast in a straight line till it got out of sight. was about twice as bright as im gonna guess thats jupiter in the sky in july.
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cusin and roommate were outside chatting in the morning and heard some noises in the fron yard. so we wnt o the roof to get a closer look. it was just the newspaper getting dropped off. then we saw a object east of us. very bright light. thought it was a planet at first. venus maybe. then it started to move towads us and side to side. it moved very irregularly, not like any aircraft i have ever seen. it didnt have any noise that we could tell, but it may have been a few miles from us and we have a highway close to us. it was very large and seemed to spin and rotate. we looked at it with binoclars and noticed beams coming off of it that looked like they we spot lights. blue beams that moved up and down. the object had 3 to 5 lights on it. all diffetent sizes. e tried getting ictures of it but all were too blurry and dull. our cameras wouldt work becuase there wasnt enoug light. the light went away around 6 am and stayed in the same sot for almost 3 hours. the next night we went out again and saw a different light of the same discription but in a different spot. the object had a strange aurra around it a glowing whiteish yellow circle.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object was due east. egg shaped. moved irregulalrly side to side, up and down

content.detailedDescription: Well to begin with i was watching the satellites in orbit with my bear eyes then i spotted a very bright star but then it got closser..So close that is was 4 times the size of the brightest star in the ske(the star of david) it was moving in a north and at the closest point it could not have been anymore than 2 hunfread feet form me.I woke my wife to witness this as i knew the was something was out of the oprdinary.It was a star like object but was much brighter.I would say 4 times as bright as the start of david.It moved like it was in control.It went in a straight line.No erratic movements at all.I was very excited at this time.I do not have a video camers at this time but i certainly wish i did for this was totally out of this world.I watched the object until it went out of view behind a large hill.I still continued to watch incase it reapeared but to no avail.That night i could not sleep well as i was still very excited due to this experiance and i will never forget it..My god this was so close to me..If i had to guess the sixe.Well mabe a ..A small mini van in size.But it was exactly like a star.The shape.Round.The brightness.Yes it was a massive star floating 200 ft away from me going its own way.Since this sighting my mind has not stopped going in circles.Well that is about it .I am sure i have not forgot or missed out anything .I feel like i had to reprt this as this is very fascinating .Plus it was so-close to me .Mindblowing.Okay people thank you for listening to me and bless you and if you come across any info on this could you please forward it to me as i feel i need to know what this object was,oh yes no noise atall from this star like object...Myself and my wife spotted this.My wifw /e was asleep and i woke her when i spotted this unusall star like object hovering in the sky.Then the object procceded to travel towards grangemouth area.Thank you for you tim if you want of need any more information please do not hesitate to phone.I have left my details.
content.summary: I was stargazing as i usually do on clear nights

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to the garage when i see this light in the sky its yellow at first then it starts flashing red and blue then it gets bigger and starts to disappear then comes back then then turns back into a little dot. then started flashing again so went and got my camera and started taking pictures and movie
content.summary: Round object that changed shape and flashed different colors

content.detailedDescription:
I live in des moines proper a couple blocks north of the freeway.  i stepped into my kitchen close to midnight, as always i peered through the window to look at the northern sky.  then i noticed a multi-colored shining object to the north, beyond some trees, which have to be at least 100 feet tall (about 200-300 yards north of my house).

my first instinct was it was a glare on the upper portion of the window, from my light.  i then moved towards the window, realizing this was not the case.

then i actually said to myself aloud; "why is that plane flying so low?"- i do live a few miles northwest of the des moines airport.  then i actually had a solid 6-7 seconds to take this object in...  the problem was it was not moving towards the airport... or away for that matter...  i will admit i have studied this kind of phenomena, in-depth...  what i saw, before this anomaly literally faded out, looked very similar to a supposed case in the early 1990's in carp, ontario, canada.  this object seemed to have multiple shimmering orbs, however...

i will admit- i only had enough time to decipher what i was looking at, which obviously, i have no idea what, or who's it was.  i know these were not fireworks, it was too late for that on a weeknight (in my neighborhood), i did not hear a solitary firecracker lit that night, there was not a sound, expect for my mouth hitting the floor, that is.  not to mention this thing was above or parallel to trees that are 100 feet tall (plus) trees and it was already behind them, and didn't look like fireworks!  i would also have to admit the lights were not quite as bright as a local firework. 

from the 10 seconds of the entire event, i would have to say this object was large, larger than a single engine cessna, etc.  from it's position from me- i would surely say this was probably larger than a commercial jetliner.  

i take these things seriously and would not post unless very serious.  please, if anyone else saw this thing- please repost!
content.summary: Unknown aerial phenomena - visually, very similar to carp, ontario  case

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight, july 7th, my sister and i were walking out of bible study on jerome st., which overlooks the valley of el cajon. we saw a single red light in the sky. at first we thought it was a plane. we stood by our cars talking before we took off, and during that time we noticed that the light was moving very slowly across the sky. several helicopters and planes went over, but this was much farther away and moving 1/10th the speed and was 100% red in color. it looked like a really large, really bright red pulsing star. so i'm glancing at it, and notice several bizarre course corrections, all of which completely defy the law of physics. we started to talk about it with unease. my sister called her husband at home over in la mesa, and asked him to walk outside and look in the sky. he saw it but had no idea what it could be, and he used to be in the military. we watched it creep across the sky, hover in one spot for a few minutes, creep some more, and then after about a total of 15 minutes, it began to flicker, turned bright silver, and literally disappeared in front of our eyes. i could not believe what i saw. anyone else see this around 9:30 over el cajon, ca?

i don't know what it was, and i will not speculate, but there are apparently various websites where people reported several bright red objects that behaved the exact same way being seen over el cajon on the 4th of july. if you google 'red lights over el cajon ca', you will see the sites i refer to. then i found other websites that talk about red lights being seen over el cajon for years. ??? this is all new to me. i have no idea what it was and it was very un-nerving.
content.summary: Large red flashing star-like object
